title: OCS support LF Diamond+ ADC duo for DuoQ
body:
LF Diamond ADC to grind soloq with.

I am starting my soloq grind this week and thought it would be good to duo bot lane with an ADC. I have been playing almost exclusively competitive league for over a year now. I peaked last season in challenger and was master for most of the season. 

- Preferably a highly mechanical ADC
- Has voice comms
- Positive mentality

Will be trialing over the next few days to see if we synergize well. 

Add my ign if interested

IGN: bluz0r

replies.body: Hi there man, I would love to play with you, I actually transferred from EUW recently and I left my main their, if you want proof it is Diamond I can show you no prob, I am actually a D4 Top main but ADC is my secondary and my account that I would love to duo with you on is ADC only, I would love to add you on my account "Marksmain 2017".
